title: Budget 2024: Govt may tweak laws to push banking sector reforms in Budget session
description: The govt plans to introduce amendments to various banking laws during the Budget session to facilitate banking sector reforms, including privatisation of public sector banks. These amendments aim to decrease government holding in state-owned banks, enhance governance, and protect investors. The upcoming session, starting on July 22, will address these crucial changes.
